response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task is to fold a bath towel and put it into the hamper. From the observed objects and relations, we can see that there are several bath towels and they are all inside the clothes dryer. The hamper is also observed in the environment.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the clothes dryer.
(2) Open the clothes dryer.
(3) Take out a bath towel from the clothes dryer.
(4) Fold the bath towel.
(5) Move the robot to the hamper.
(6) Put the folded bath towel into the hamper.
response.code:
